ads.infobar: Boost ROI with branded ad slots & white-label embeds.

hero.title: Shrink image and video libraries without losing quality, store them safely, stream instantly.
hero.description: Whether you manage millions of images or heavy video archives, keep quality high while lowering delivery costs. Automate compression, storage tiers, and delivery workflows with one platform.

upload.title: Drop files here or browse
upload.description: Supports MP4, MOV, WebM, GIF up to 1 GiB. Unlimited web compression covers up to 5 MB images and up to 100 MB videos—larger jobs route to the metered queue automatically.
upload.note: No card required. Track API and storage usage under Billing when you are ready to scale.

presets.name: Archive Master
presets.description: Store original, emit MP4, WebM, GIF variants automatically

features.title: Professional media processing solutions
features.intro: Optimize your entire media workflow with video, image, document, and API-focused features.

apiPromo.title: Run compression and storage from a single API
apiPromo.description: Kick off jobs in the browser, scale with the API. Orchestrate compression, storage policies, and delivery with one JSON payload.
benefits: Single payload controls compression, storage, and delivery
Webhook, S3, and CDN callbacks with signed URLs

testimonials.eyebrow: Ops & media teams that compress at scale
testimonials.title: Built for product, video, and platform teams shipping millions of assets.

items.quote: We push 40 TB of product video every month. Starter keeps marketing fully self-serve while Studio absorbs our API bursts without surprise invoices.
items.author: Maya Chen
items.role: Director of Media Ops, Lumin Ledger

items.quote: Storage tiers let us archive every master while shipping lean WebP and WebM versions automatically. Finance finally gets predictable, auditable billing exports.
items.author: Ege Demir

pricing.title: From unlimited web compression to turnkey infrastructure.

plans.name: Starter
features: Unlimited web compression for up to 5 MB images and up to 100 MB videos
Shared compute queue and email support

plans.name: Studio
features: Unlimited web compression for up to 50 MB images and up to 1 GB videos
10k API requests per day included; $1 per additional 20k
Usage dashboards, billing exports, priority queue

plans.name: Enterprise
features: Dedicated 2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM nodes with 25 GB storage included
Scale CPU, RAM, and storage in $0.99 increments
Estimated 50k requests per day capacity per base node
Private networking, custom SLAs, white-glove onboarding

pricingPage.title: Choose compression, API, and infrastructure that scale with you
pricingPage.subtitle: Start with unlimited web compression, then layer in API calls, managed storage, or dedicated servers as your workloads grow.
features: Geo-redundant storage replication with lifecycle rules
Preset library for WebM, MP4, WebP, AVIF, and GIF outputs
Real-time usage dashboards with exportable billing data
Role-based access control, audit logs, and webhook retries

faqs.question: How does unlimited web compression work?
faqs.answer: Starter and Studio plans let you compress from the browser without limits as long as files stay under the included web thresholds. Larger uploads automatically move to the metered queue so you never lose work.

faqs.question: What happens after the included API requests?
faqs.answer: We meter in predictable blocks—$1 per additional 10k requests on Starter and $1 per 20k on Studio. Usage is visible in real time and billed at the end of the month.

faqs.question: Can I use your storage with my own CDN?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can keep assets in our managed storage, export to S3-compatible buckets, or push to your CDN after processing.

pricingPage.contactDescription: Our solutions team can design dedicated regions, hybrid rendering, and tailored SLAs.

calculator.subtitle: Switch plans and drag the handles to reflect the API, storage, and infrastructure you need.

plan.starterDescription: Unlimited web compression for up to 5 MB images and up to 100 MB videos. Pay as you go for API calls and storage.
plan.studioDescription: Everything in Starter plus bigger web limits, 10k API requests per day, and 1 GB managed storage.
plan.enterpriseDescription: Rent dedicated nodes. Start with 2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM and 25 GB storage, then drag to scale resources.

calculator.apiIncluded: {{included}} free, then billed per additional block.
calculator.storageEnterpriseHelper: First 25 GB included. Drag to add more reserved storage.
calculator.cpuHelper: Base node includes 2 vCPU. Each extra vCPU is $0.99.
calculator.ramHelper: Base node includes 2 GB RAM. Each extra GB is $0.99.

breakdown.baseStarterDetail: Unlimited web compression for up to 5 MB images and up to 100 MB videos.
breakdown.baseStudioDetail: Includes bigger web uploads (up to 50 MB images, up to 1 GB videos) and 10k API requests per day.
breakdown.baseEnterpriseDetail: Dedicated 2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM node with 25 GB storage. Estimated 50k requests per day.

highlight.starter: Perfect for individuals shipping lightweight assets with occasional API or storage bursts.
highlight.studio: Great for teams managing steady workloads with predictable API volume and storage needs.
highlight.enterprise: Tune dedicated capacity for pipelines handling massive daily workloads or on-prem requirements.
